1110100111000100 1001110101110010 1 -> sum: 1000011100110111, cout: 1

0010010101100010 0000000101000000 0 -> sum: 0010011010100010, cout: 0

0101001100100111 0110001011101000 1 -> sum: 1011011000010000, cout: 0
